AccessState.description: Describes the options for the access characteristics of an endpoint.

enumDescriptions.NonOptimized: The endpoint(s) are in an Active/NonOptimized state.
enumDescriptions.Optimized: The endpoint(s) are in an Active/Optimized state.
enumDescriptions.Standby: The endpoint(s) are in a Standby state.
enumDescriptions.Transitioning: The endpoint(s) are transitioning to a new AccesState.

enumLongDescriptions.NonOptimized: In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an Active/NonOptimized state.
enumLongDescriptions.Optimized: In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an Active/Optimized state.
enumLongDescriptions.Standby: In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in a Standby state.
enumLongDescriptions.Transitioning: In the context of this enumeration literal, at least one endpoint shall be transitioning to a new AccesState.
enumLongDescriptions.Unavailable: In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an unavailable state.

AccessState.longDescription: Access to all associated resources through all aggregated endpoints shall share this access state.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EndpointGroup.description: A group of endpoints that are managed as a unit.
EndpointGroup.longDescription: A group of endpoints that shall be managed as a unit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccessState.longDescription: Access to all associated resources through all aggregated endpoints shall share this access state.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Endpoints.longDescription: The value of each entry shall reference an Endpoint resource.

GroupType.longDescription: The group contains only endpoints of a given type Client/Initiator or Server/Target.  If this endpoint group represents a SCSI target group, the value of GroupType shall be Server.

Identifier.longDescription: The value shall be unique within the managed ecosystem.

Links.description: Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This structure shall contain references to resources that are not contained within this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Preferred.longDescription: A value of True in this property shall indicate that access to the associated resource through the endpoints in this  endpoint group is preferred over access through other endpoints. The default value for this property is false.

TargetEndpointGroupIdentifier.description: A defined identifier for this group.
TargetEndpointGroupIdentifier.longDescription: If this endpoint group represents a SCSI target group, the value of this property shall contain a SCSI defined identifier for this group, which corresponds to the TARGET PORT GROUP field in the REPORT TARGET PORT GROUPS response and the TARGET PORT GROUP field in an INQUIRY VPD page 85 response, type 5h identifier. See the INCITS SAM-5 specification.

enumDescriptions.Client: The group contains the client (initiator) endpoints.
enumDescriptions.Server: The group contains the server (target) endpoints.

Links.description: Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This structure shall contain references to resources that are not contained within this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #EndpointGroup.v1_1_0.EndpointGroup
